text:
@BarackObama @BlueDaysAhead @GovAbbott, 36 states in this country allow Vote By Mail. 7 more states allow Vote By Mail for COVID-19 reasons. So, FORTY-THREE (43) STATES IN THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA allow MAIL IN VOTING! 

You opened TX too early--a disaster! The LEAST you can do is push this through!
